description: This file implements the login screen of a Flutter mobile application, providing UI elements and logic for user authentication via an AuthProvider, including navigation to registration and hotel screens.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Public interface widget for user login functionality.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: Internal state class managing the login screen, handling user input, login process, and navigation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the login screen UI, including input fields, login button, and navigation to registration.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles the login process by invoking the AuthProvider's login method and navigating or showing errors based on authentication result.
